name: Codebreaker Virus Berserker
text:
2+ monsters, including a "Codebreaker" monster
When this card is Special Summoned, if it is co-linked: You can Special Summon up to 2 "Codebreaker" monsters from your hand and/or GY to any zone(s) a Link Monster(s) points to. During your Main Phase: You can destroy Spells/Traps your opponent controls, up to the number of linked "Codebreaker" monsters on the field. You can only use each effect of "Codebreaker Virus Berserker" once per turn.
